name: Petri (Kayleigh Manchester)
description:
Avoid larger amoebas long enough to eat smaller ones and become the largest amoeba in the dish. 

Gameplay: Use the mouse to control the direction and speed of your amoeba. Avoid getting hit by larger amoebas and run into smaller amoebas to feed and grow. A level is cleared when you become the largest.

Right now, the only level is the first one. Selecting the "Next Level" button resets the game. However, I hope to add more mechanics and levels in the future.

I created everything in this game myself.
